name: Mimic (itch) (SugarSores, jrhodes, austineast)
description:
THE TREASURE IS ALL MINE! What?

Mimic was made for the #GMTK2019 game jam centered around the theme of "Only one". We satisfied this with you only have "one chest"/ "one mouth".

The mimic has to stuff his mouth before time runs out or is caught by a fellow looter.  Oh also the treasures spawned are different everytime you play.

How to play

Move around with WASD.

Press E to open the inventory.

Use the mouse to pickup nearby objects onto the tongue. You can rotate the items with WASD while you are holding them! Use that tongue real estate wisely!
